ovh_payment_method_register_force_as_def: This payment method will be used for your product's automatic payments. You can change it at any time via your payment methods. You will receive an email notification before each renewal date.
ovh_payment_method_register_set_as_defau: I want to choose this as my default payment method as soon as it is validated.
By ticking this box, you authorise OVH S.A.S to save this payment method as a default payment method in order to facilitate the payment of your next orders.
By ticking this box, you will save this payment method as your default payment method.
It will be automatically used for payments for your services with automatic renewal and pay-as-you-go billing. You can change your payment methods at any time via the OVHcloud Control Panel.
ovh_payment_method_register_force_as_def: After adding your PayPal account and payment method, PayPal will be added to your "My Payment Methods" as a default payment method. Your default payment method will automatically be used for payments for your services including automatic renewals and pay-as-you-go. You can add, delete or modify your payment method at any time via the OVHcloud Control Panel.
ovh_payment_method_register_set_as_defau: By clicking this box, you authorize OVH US LLC to save this means of payment as your default payment method.  Your default payment method will automatically be used for payments for your services including automatic renewals and pay-as-you-go. You can add, delete or modify your payment method at any time via the OVHcloud Control Panel.
ovh_payment_method_register_explanation_: To register a new bank card, a small amount of money is temporarily deducted from your bank account in order to check your card's details and validity. Nothing will be charged to your account.
Your credit card will be activated automatically.
The transaction to register your card will be processed by OVH S.A.S.
You will be redirected to our service provider's secure interface to save a new bank card.
You will be redirected to a space where you can register your bank account and electronically sign your direct debit mandate.
You can then use this payment method to complete your order.
Warning: the bank account owner must also be the OVHcloud account owner.
The data collected is processed by OVHcloud as a data controller in order to set up your SEPA direct debit.

To set up a SEPA direct debit, you will need to sign a mandate electronically using a solution provided by Worldline, a service provider authorised to deliver the trusted services defined by the “eDIAS” Regulation No. 910/2014 of 23 July 2014. In this context, the data is sent to Worldline.

To finish adding your PayPal account and payment method, click on the PayPal button below. A pop-up window, redirecting you to the secure PayPal server, will open allowing you to enter the required information.
When you click on the PayPal button, a pop-up window will open in order for you to finish adding your payment method.
A maximum of {{ registrationCharges }} will be charged to your card to confirm that it’s active. This charge will be fully refunded within 48 hours.
